sec.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
sec.p: Research supported by FAPESP (#12345678-9)

element-citation.article-title: Interobserver variation in histopathological assessment of Helicobacter pylori gastritis

ref.mixed-citation: 1. Aydin O, Egilmez R, Karabacak T, Kanik A. Interobserver variation in histopathological assessment of Helicobacter pylori gastritis. World J Gastroenterol. 2003;9:2232-5.

element-citation.article-title: Efficacy of four widely used techniques of the diagnosis of Helicobacter pylori infection in gastric ulcer disease

ref.mixed-citation: 2. Barmejo San José F, Boixeda de Miguel D, Gisbert JP, Martin de Argila de Prados C, Sanz Sacristán JM, Defarges Pons V, Moreno Almazán L, García Plaza A. Efficacy of four widely used techniques of the diagnosis of Helicobacter pylori infection in gastric ulcer disease. Rev Clin Esp. 2000;200:475-9.

element-citation.article-title: How (who?) and when to test or retest for H. Pylori

ref.mixed-citation: 3. Burette A. How (who?) and when to test or retest for H. Pylori. Acta Gastroenterol Belg. 1998;61:336-43.

element-citation.trans-title: Helicobacter pylori and peptic disease: comparative study of the diagnostic methods

ref.mixed-citation: 4. Caetano A, Felix VN, Coimbra FT, Ganc AJ. [Helicobacter pylori and peptic disease: comparative study of the diagnostic methods]. Arq Gastroenterol. 2008;45:255-7.

element-citation.article-title: Diagnóstico mediante endoscopia de la infección por Helicobacter pylori en pacientes con úlcera gastroduodenal y hemorragia digestiva: test rápido de ureasa e histología

ref.mixed-citation: 5. Castro-Fernández M, Sánchez-Muñoz D, García-Díaz E, Miralles-Sanchiz J, Vargas-Romero J. Diagnóstico mediante endoscopia de la infección por Helicobacter pylori en pacientes con úlcera gastroduodenal y hemorragia digestiva: test rápido de ureasa e histología. Rev Esp Enferm Dig. 2004:96:395-401.

element-citation.trans-title: Avantages and limitations of diagnostic methods for H. Pylori infection

ref.mixed-citation: 6. De Korwin J. [Avantages and limitations of diagnostic methods for H. Pylori infection]. Gastroenterol Clin Biol. 2003;27:380-90.

element-citation.article-title: Hematoxylin and eosin staining of gastric tissue for the detection of Helicobacter pylori

ref.mixed-citation: 7. Fallone CA, Loo VG, Lough J, Barkun AN. Hematoxylin and eosin staining of gastric tissue for the detection of Helicobacter pylori. Helicobacter. 1997;2:32-5.

element-citation.article-title: Infección por Helicobacter pylori en pacientes con patología gastrointestinal benigna

ref.mixed-citation: 8. Fuenmayor A, Cavazza M, Beltrán de Luengo H, Gallegos B, Inciarte A, Botero L, Avila M. Infección por Helicobacter pylori en pacientes con patología gastrointestinal benigna. Rev Soc Venez Microbiol. 2002;22:27-31.

element-citation.article-title: Nuevas evidencias sobre la utilidad diagnóstica de una fórmula no comercial para la detección de la actividad de ureasa de Helicobacter pylori en biopsias gástricas

ref.mixed-citation: 9. Fuenmayor A, Hernández I, Paz A, Cavazza ME, Lizarzábal M. Nuevas evidencias sobre la utilidad diagnóstica de una fórmula no comercial para la detección de la actividad de ureasa de Helicobacter pylori en biopsias gástricas. Kasmera. 2006;34:40-52.

element-citation.article-title: 1989 A/S/G/E survey of endoscopic sedation and monitoring practices

ref.mixed-citation: 10. Keeffe EB, O'Connor KW. 1989 A/S/G/E survey of endoscopic sedation and monitoring practices. Gastrointest Endosc. 1990;36:s13-8.

element-citation.article-title: Analysis of eigth different methods for the detection of Helicobacter pylori infection in patients with dyspepsia

ref.mixed-citation: 11. Kullavanijaya P, Thong-Ngam D, Hanvivatvong O, Nunthapisud P, Tangkijvanich P, Suwanagool P. Analysis of eigth different methods for the detection of Helicobacter pylori infection in patients with dyspepsia. J Gastroenterol Hepatol. 2004:19:1392-6.

element-citation.article-title: Is routine histological evaluation an accurate test for Helicobacter pylori infection?

ref.mixed-citation: 12. MaConi G, Vago L, Galletta G, Imbesi V, Sangaletti O, Parente F, Cucino C, Bonetto S, Bianchi Porro G. Is routine histological evaluation an accurate test for Helicobacter pylori infection? Aliment Pharmacol Ther. 1999;13: 327-31.

person-group.collab: Grupo Conferencia Española de Consenso sobre Helicobacter pylori

element-citation.article-title: Indications, diagnostic test and Helicobacter pylori erradication therapy. Recommendations by the 2nd Spanish Consensus Conference [online]

ref.mixed-citation: 13. Monés J, Gisbert JP, Borda F, Domínguez-Muñoz E; Grupo Conferencia Española de Consenso sobre Helicobacter pylori. Indications, diagnostic test and Helicobacter pylori erradication therapy. Recommendations by the 2nd Spanish Consensus Conference [online]. Rev Esp Enferm Dig. 2005;97: 348-74.

element-citation.article-title: Comparative study of microbiological and histopathological techniques used for the detection of Helicobacter pylori

ref.mixed-citation: 14. Muñoz E, Corcuera MT, Roldán M, Gómez F, Picazo A, Baquero M, Alonso MJ. Comparative study of microbiological and histopathological techniques used for the detection of Helicobacter pylori. Eur J Histochem. 1998;42:297-302.

element-citation.article-title: Detection methods of Helicobacter pylori: accuracy and costs

ref.mixed-citation: 15. Onders RP. Detection methods of Helicobacter pylori: accuracy and costs. Am Surg. 1997;63:665-8.

element-citation.article-title: The influence of endoscopic procedures upon the contamination Helicobacter pylori cultures

ref.mixed-citation: 16. Ribeiro ML, Godoy AP, Benvengo YH, Ecclissato CC, Mendonça S, Pedrazzoli J Jr. The influence of endoscopic procedures upon the contamination Helicobacter pylori cultures. Arq Gastroenterol. 2004;41:100-3.

element-citation.article-title: Histological identification of Helicobacter pylori: comparison of staining methods

ref.mixed-citation: 17. Rotimi O, Cairns A, Gray S, Moayyedi P, Dixon MF. Histological identification of Helicobacter pylori: comparison of staining methods. J Clin Pathol. 2000;53:756-9.
18. Waye J, Geenen J, Fleischer D, editores. Techniques in therapeutic endoscopy. New York: Gower Medical Publishing; 1987.

element-citation.article-title: The use of routine special stains for upper gastrointestinal biopsies

ref.mixed-citation: 19. Wright CL, Kelly JK. The use of routine special stains for upper gastrointestinal biopsies. Am J Surg Pathol. 2006;30:357-61.

element-citation.article-title: Comparison of culture and histology for the identification of Helicobacter pylori in endoscopic biopsies

ref.mixed-citation: 20. Yap I, Kung JS, Wee A, Tay HH, Guan R, Ho B, Kang JY. Comparison of culture and histology for the identification of Helicobacter pylori in endoscopic biopsies. Ann Acad Med Singapore. 1990;19:354-6.
